descriptions.text: Do not seat passengers without an accompanying infant in a bassinet seat
Do not seat children in exit row seats
Do not seat passengers with special needs in exit row seats
Do not seat passengers with wheelchairs in Club World upper deck seats on Boeing 747
be over the age of 12 years
be able bodied and fit enough to open and operate an emergency exit door
be able to understand instructions given in English
not be substantially blind or deaf
Service not refundable but value of EMD can be applied on future purchase
Service not refundable and not exchangeable
